title: "The Enchanting Power of His Words and Gaze"

In the last part, the author goes on to analyze this person's behavior in more detail, highlighting the ways in which he exerts his will even at a distance. The person's unique gaze and courteous manner are also discussed. Pay attention as the author breaks down the simplicity of his conversation. He does not look in your eyes or in one of your two eyes, but looks exactly between the two eyes, at the root of your nose. last_phrase: In conclusion, the man described exudes a powerful yet courteous presence, with a penetrating gaze that leaves a lasting impression.
